plot: Fluttershy has volunteered to clean out the hamster habitat at the animal rescue center. While Fluttershy cleans, Rarity gives them all clothes and accessories, which they fight over.
title: Hamstocalypse Now
plot_es: Fluttershy has volunteered to clean out the hamster habitat at the animal rescue center. While Fluttershy cleans, Rarity gives them all clothes and accessories, which they fight over.
plot_en: Fluttershy has volunteered to clean out the hamster habitat at the animal rescue center. While Fluttershy cleans, Rarity gives them all clothes and accessories, which they fight over.
